KalturaAssetDistributionCondition.description: Abstract class for asset distribution condition

KalturaAssetDistributionPropertyConditio.description: Defines the condition to match a property and value on core asset object (or one if its inherited objects)

KalturaAssetResource.description: Used to ingest media that is already ingested to Kaltura system as a different flavor asset in the past, the new created flavor asset will be ready immediately using a file sync of link type that will point to the existing file sync of the existing flavor asset.

KalturaBooleanField.description: A boolean representation to return evaluated dynamic value

KalturaBooleanValue.description: A boolean representation to return an array of booleans

KalturaBulkServiceData.description:
This class represents object-specific data passed to the 
 bulk upload job.

KalturaBulkServiceFilterData.description: Represents the Bulk service input for filter bulk upload

KalturaBulkUploadCategoryData.description:
This class represents object-specific data passed to the 
 bulk upload job.

KalturaBulkUploadCategoryEntryData.description:
This class represents object-specific data passed to the 
 bulk upload job.

KalturaBulkUploadCategoryUserData.description:
This class represents object-specific data passed to the 
 bulk upload job.

KalturaBulkUploadCsvJobData.description: Represents the Bulk upload job data for xml bulk upload

KalturaBulkUploadEntryData.description:
This class represents object-specific data passed to the 
 bulk upload job.

KalturaBulkUploadFilterJobData.description: Represents the Bulk upload job data for filter bulk upload

KalturaBulkUploadObjectData.description:
This class represents object-specific data passed to the 
 bulk upload job.

KalturaBulkUploadUserData.description:
This class represents object-specific data passed to the 
 bulk upload job.

KalturaBulkUploadXmlJobData.description: Represents the Bulk upload job data for xml bulk upload

KalturaClientNotification.description: Client notification object to hold the notification url and the data when sending client side notifications

KalturaContentResource.description: Is a unified way to add content to Kaltura whether it's an uploaded file, webcam recording, imported URL or existing file sync.

KalturaCoordinatesContextField.description: Represents the current request country context as calculated based on the IP address

KalturaCountryContextField.description: Represents the current request country context as calculated based on the IP address

KalturaDropFolderFileResource.description: Used to ingest media that dropped through drop folder

KalturaEmailNotificationCategoryRecipien.description: Job Data representing the provider of recipients for a single categoryId
API object which provides the recipients of category related notifications.

KalturaEmailNotificationRecipientJobData.description: Abstract class representing the final output recipients going into the batch mechanism

KalturaEmailNotificationRecipientProvide.description: Abstract core class  which provides the recipients (to, CC, BCC) for an email notification

KalturaEmailNotificationStaticRecipientJ.description: JobData representing the static receipient array

KalturaEmailNotificationStaticRecipientP.description: API class for recipient provider containing a static list of email recipients.

KalturaEmailNotificationUserRecipientJob.description: JobData representing the dynamic user receipient array

KalturaEmailNotificationUserRecipientPro.description: API class for recipient provider which constructs a dynamic list of recipients according to a user filter

KalturaEntryContextDataParams.description: Object which contains contextual entry-related data.

KalturaEntryReplacementOptions.description: Advanced configuration for entry replacement process

KalturaEntryResource.description: Used to ingest media that is already ingested to Kaltura system as a different entry in the past, the new created flavor asset will be ready immediately using a file sync of link type that will point to the existing file sync of the existing entry.

KalturaEvalBooleanField.description: Evaluates PHP statement, depends on the execution context

KalturaEvalStringField.description: Evaluates PHP statement, depends on the execution context

KalturaFileSyncResource.description: Used to ingest media that is already ingested to Kaltura system as a different file in the past, the new created flavor asset will be ready immediately using a file sync of link type that will point to the existing file sync.

KalturaFilterPager.description: The KalturaFilterPager object enables paging management to be applied upon service list actions.

KalturaHttpNotificationDataFields.description: If this class used as the template data, the fields will be taken from the content parameters

KalturaHttpNotificationObjectData.description: Evaluates PHP statement, depends on the execution context

KalturaIntegerField.description: An int representation to return evaluated dynamic value

KalturaIntegerValue.description: An int representation to return an array of ints

KalturaIpAddressContextField.description: Represents the current request IP address context

KalturaKeyValue.description: A key value pair representation to return an array of key-value pairs (associative array)

KalturaLiveEntryRecordingOptions.description: A representation of a live stream recording entry configuration

KalturaLiveStatsEvent.description: Will hold data from the Kaltura Player components to be passed on to the live analytics system

KalturaLiveStreamConfiguration.description: A representation of a live stream configuration

KalturaLiveStreamPushPublishConfiguratio.description: Basic push-publish configuration for Kaltura live stream entry

KalturaLiveStreamPushPublishRTMPConfigur.description: A representation of an RTMP live stream configuration

KalturaObjectIdField.description: Evaluates object ID according to given context

KalturaObjectIdentifier.description: Configuration for extended item in the Kaltura MRSS feeds

KalturaOperationAttributes.description: Base class to all operation attributes types

KalturaOperationResource.description: A resource that perform operation (transcoding, clipping, cropping) before the flavor is ready.

KalturaRemoteStorageResource.description: Used to ingest media that is available on remote server and accessible using the supplied URL, the media file won't be downloaded but a file sync object of URL type will point to the media URL.

KalturaRemoteStorageResources.description: Used to ingest media that is available on remote server and accessible using the supplied URL, the media file won't be downloaded but a file sync object of URL type will point to the media URL.

KalturaResource.description: Used to ingest entry object, as single resource or list of resources accompanied by asset params ids.

KalturaServerFileResource.description: Used to ingest media file that is already accessible on the shared disc.

KalturaSshUrlResource.description: Used to ingest media that is available on remote SSH server and accessible using the supplied URL, media file will be downloaded using import job in order to make the asset ready.

KalturaStatsEvent.description: Will hold data from the Kaltura UI components to be passed on to the reports and analytics system

KalturaStatsKmcEvent.description: Will hold data from the Kaltura UI components to be passed on to the reports and analytics system

KalturaString.description: A string representation to return an array of strings

KalturaStringField.description: A string representation to return evaluated dynamic value

KalturaStringValue.description: A string representation to return an array of strings

KalturaTimeContextField.description: Represents the current time context on Kaltura servers

KalturaUploadedFileTokenResource.description: Used to ingest media that uploaded to the system and represented by token that returned from upload.upload action or uploadToken.add action.

KalturaUrlResource.description: Used to ingest media that is available on remote server and accessible using the supplied URL, media file will be downloaded using import job in order to make the asset ready.

KalturaUserAgentContextField.description: Represents the current request user agent context

KalturaUserEmailContextField.description: Represents the current session user e-mail address context

KalturaValue.description: A representation to return an array of values

KalturaWebcamTokenResource.description: Used to ingest media that streamed to the system and represented by token that returned from media server such as FMS or red5.

Will write to the event log a single line representing the event

event_id - number is the row number in yuval's excel
datetime - same format as MySql's datetime - can change and should reflect the time zone
session id - can be some big random number or guid
partner id
entry id
unique viewer
widget id
ui_conf id
uid - the puser id as set by the ppartner
current point - in milliseconds
duration - milliseconds
user ip
process duration - in milliseconds
control id
seek
new point
referrer
	
	
	 KalturaStatsEvent $event

Creates new download job for multiple entry ids (comma separated), an email will be sent when the job is done
	 This sevice support the following entries: 
	 - MediaEntry
	 - Video will be converted using the flavor params id
	 - Audio will be downloaded as MP3
	 - Image will be downloaded as Jpeg
	 - MixEntry will be flattened using the flavor params id
	 - Other entry types are not supported
	 Returns the admin email that the email message will be sent to

parameters.description: Comma separated list of entry ids
parameters.name: entryIds
